Description

Class that creates a JPanel that rotates a background image.

Class that creates a JPanel that allows the user to choose a color.

Class that contains the name and the date of a file or a folder.

Directory class that contains recursive methods to copy and delete directories.

The Dsync class used for the local synchronisation.
Gui
Gui class that contains all the methods used to create the GUI of the Dsync application.
Network
